basics.name: Daniel E. Guyumus P.
basics.label: Civil Engineer, M.Sc
basics.summary: Civil Engineer with MSc in Civil Engineering focused on sustainable management of water resources and hydroinformatics. Over 6 years of experience in hydraulic and hydrological modelling, GIS data management, and remote sensing data processing. Research interests include hydrological and hydraulic modelling, climate change, remote sensing data processing, and meteorology.

work.name: DODF (Planning and Development Department), Universidad Nacional de Colombia
work.summary: Design of hydrosanitary networks and detailed drawings of assigned projects. Audit designs and studies contracted by the DODF. Prepare technical concepts in pre-contractual processes.

work.name: INGETEC S.A.S.
work.summary: Conducted hydrological analyses for projects across Colombia, Panama, Chile, and Bolivia. Work included erodibility analysis, hazard and risk assessments, environmental impact studies, and hydrological modeling for hydroelectric and water supply projects.

work.name: AQUAING S.A.S. / Gabriel Lozano Sandoval
work.position: Assistant Design Engineer on Hydrological Analysis
work.summary: Developed studies and designs for supply and sanitation water systems in multiple municipalities. Contributed to hydrology and climatology components in river basin planning and performed risk level assessments.

education.institution: Universidad de Los Andes, Bogotá, Colombia
education.summary: Teaching Assistant graduate courses (Hydrosystems modeling, Hydrosystems analysis, River Hydraulics). Research assistant with thesis on hydrological modelling in Paramo areas using meteorological remote sensing data.
Academic Director ANEIC-UQ student association. Awarded scholarship for best grades. Thesis on hydrological modelling for water balance in La Vieja River Basin using WEAP.

research.organization: CIIA Environmental Engineering Research Center, Universidad de Los Andes
research.summary: Research assistant on selecting sustainable urban drainage systems (SUDS) for Bogotá and on flood hazard analysis for BIMA Outlet Shopping Center using bidimensional hydraulic flood modelling.
Analyzed surface water balance for La Vieja River Basin using decision support system tool WEAP.

publications.name: 118th Conference on Fluvial Hydraulics – RiverFlow 2016
publications.summary: Poster on two-dimensional hydraulic flood modelling in domains with multiple tributary areas for risk analysis. St Louis, Missouri, USA.

publications.name: XXII Seminario Nacional de Hidráulica e Hidrología
publications.summary: Presentation on two-dimensional hydraulic flood modelling in domains with multiple tributary areas for risk analysis. Bogotá, Colombia.

publications.name: XXVII Congreso Latinoamericano de Hidráulica
publications.summary: Paper on two-dimensional hydraulic flood modelling in domains with multiple tributary areas for risk analysis. Lima, Peru.

awards.title: Scholarship for Best Academic Grade Term Average

extracurricular.name: Academic Director, ANEIC-UQ
extracurricular.summary: National Association of Civil Engineering Students at Universidad del Quindío, Armenia, Colombia.

references.reference: M.Sc Civil Engineering, Universidad de Los Andes
Ph.D Civil Engineering, University of Newcastle
